what: provides data from the Atlantic Series
title: provides data from the Atlantic Series
text: tropical subtropical forests along coast interior South America used one largest forests world – Atlantic Forest – 1.6 million km² spanning Brazil, Argentina, Paraguay. ATLANTIC collection includes series Data Papers community composition distribution plants animals Atlantic Forest. papers fundamental tool scientists policy makers. goal package provide data Atlantic Series, collection data papers Ecology biodiversity data Atlantic Forest. Currently, 16 data sets: nine vertebrates, two vertebrate traits, two invertebrates, two interactions animal-plant, one plant, one spatial data.
